author: cnbc.com
title: Columbus McKinnon Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Fiscal 2018 Conference Call and Webcast
text:
BUFFALO, N.Y.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Columbus McKinnon Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCO), a leading designer, manufacturer and marketer of motion control products, technologies and services for material handling, announced that it will release its fourth quarter and full fiscal year 2018 results before the markets open on Wednesday, May 30, 2018.
The Company will host a conference call and webcast to review the financial and operating results for the period and discuss its corporate strategy and outlook. A question-and-answer session will follow.
Fourth Quarter and Full Fiscal Year 2018 Conference Call
Wednesday, May 30, 2018 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time Phone: 201-493-6780 Webcast and accompanying slide presentation: http://www.cmworks.com/investors
An audio replay of the call will be available from 1:00 p.m. Eastern Time on the day of the call through Wednesday, June 6, 2018. To listen to the audio replay, dial 412-317-6671 and enter the conference ID number 13678787. Alternatively, you may access webcast replay at http://www.cmworks.com/investors , where a transcript will be posted once available.
About Columbus McKinnon
Columbus McKinnon is a leading worldwide designer, manufacturer and marketer of motion control products, technologies, systems and services that efficiently and ergonomically move, lift, position and secure materials. Key products include hoists, cranes, actuators, rigging tools, light rail work stations and digital power and motion control systems. The Company is focused on commercial and industrial applications that require the safety and quality provided by its superior design and engineering know-how. Comprehensive information on Columbus McKinnon is available at http://www.cmworks.com .
